channel.title: I want to change the mining in my server!
channel.description:
i have this server and the mining is sooo dumb its slow and gives money slowly and its stupid would like to know how to get rid of it without messing stuff up and re codeing regular mining but with faster mining ore. anyone can help i will greatly appreciate it :) i can post pic's if needed. thx :confused:
http://pastebin.com/Pxx08mfv
too high of txt but thats the link of what it looks like it goes from like prayer to agility to mining threw breaks??

item.title: I want to change the mining in my server!
item.dc:creator: @southparkis1 southparkis1
item.description:
@southparkis1 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:6, topic:431827”][quote author=southparkis1 link=topic=534530.msg3908026#msg3908026 date=1328413709]

Remove it and implant another mining system or write it yourself

like i dont know where it starts?? i could trust me im just alittle confused where it starts and ends?? i mean i know its not difficult i think its something added into the normal codeing but im really not shure id like to get this server up and working here real sooon i have a new comp with 16gb of ram ready to run like 3 servers lol

mine is 12GB and if you don’t want to lag the fuck out you shouldn’t be doing more than 1
And if you don’t know where to start it’s time to learn some programming

and thats why im in the “server help”… i just need alittle teaching on a few things
[/quote]
Help section is for when you have problems with your work, not to start from zero,
therefor there are tutorials.
I recommend starting to read up some java documentation and trying some tutorials out to learn to understand the code.[/quote]
k ill look into it but that isnt exactly answering my problem ill post exactly what it looks like

Read full topic
item.source: I want to change the mining in my server!

item.title: I want to change the mining in my server!
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“southparkis1, post:5, topic:431827”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=534530.msg3908023#msg3908023 date=1328413607]

Remove it and implant another mining system or write it yourself

like i dont know where it starts?? i could trust me im just alittle confused where it starts and ends?? i mean i know its not difficult i think its something added into the normal codeing but im really not shure id like to get this server up and working here real sooon i have a new comp with 16gb of ram ready to run like 3 servers lol

mine is 12GB and if you don’t want to lag the fuck out you shouldn’t be doing more than 1
And if you don’t know where to start it’s time to learn some programming
[/quote]
and thats why im in the “server help”… i just need alittle teaching on a few things[/quote]
Help section is for when you have problems with your work, not to start from zero,
therefor there are tutorials.
I recommend starting to read up some java documentation and trying some tutorials out to learn to understand the code.

Read full topic
